<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #22564 by dongcarl

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull request
tested ACK 9bf43b09b6efb069e2b2e8551b4c5a63b9348815\n\nIt solves the warnings on gcc 8.3.0 (Debian 10).
Added for rc3 (if there is one)
After @tryphe showed me how to reproduce, I tested 059171009b0138555f311cedc2553015ff618323 and this does solve the problem!

I think it's important to let other reviewers know that `MAX_VERSION_BITS_DEPLOYMENTS` is not intended to be assigned, hence we only check if it's less, unlike on line 26 where `dep` might equal `DEPLOYMENT_SEGWIT`.\n\nAt least that was my interpretation.
